result.html: D'fhreagair sí na ceisteannaShe answered the questions.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟreagair sí na ceisteannaShe answered the questions.

result.ga: Freagair na ceisteanna le do thoil
result.orig: Freagair na ceisteanna le do thoil
result.html: Freagair na ceisteanna le do thoilAnswer the questions, please.
result.ponchtml: Freagair na ceisteanna le do ṫoilAnswer the questions, please.

result.eng: It is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ga: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.orig: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.html: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ponchtml: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a ċur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a churShe has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aici ceisteanna cliste a ċurShe has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.orig: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.html: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ponchtml: Is é fáṫ mo ẛuime sa ċeist seo ṫar ċeisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ga: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht

result.ponchtml: Go deiṁin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíoḋ go fóill go háiriṫe na cinn faoi ḟoirgneaṁ a seaċtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
